name: Split Up The Balls HD Free
name_original: Split Up The Balls HD Free
description:
‘Split Up The Balls’ is simple but very addicting and challenging game. Test your reaction, tame the angry bouncing balls and make them happy by separating them with moving walls! For all ages, and it is FREE!

In this game, your goal is to divide the yellow and blue balls into two groups by the colors of the balls as well as the colors of the play area.

Swipe up/down to drag the separator so that the balls can pass through the gap and move to the other side. The faster you complete the game, the more points you receive.

Features:
- 30 FREE levels
- easy control
- suitable for all ages
- short game (30-100 seconds per level)
- universal app (iPhone / iPad / iPod touch)
- excellent sounds, music and graphics
- high scores
- star rewarding system
- detailed instructions

Be sure to act swiftly in order to win!
